entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 5:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Drizzle at times heavy or rain showers changing to snow overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind southwest 20 km/h except northeast 20 gusting to 40 north of Marystown. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
